arts.sum: RW Brahim Diaz - Franco Mastantuono is in the squad, but after playing so many games and picking up an injury during the international break, he could start on the bench. Head coach Xabi Alonso had a long list of injured defenders before the international break, and that was made worse by Dean Huijsen, who is now unavailable for the game.
